summary: Adds a new weapon in Breezehome: Zatoichi\'s Katana. It\'s a bit OP, but then again so is Zatoichi!
descriptionHtml:
Adds a new weapon in Breezehome: Zatoichi\'s Katana. It\'s a bit OP, but then again so is Zatoichi!
The weapon is added to Breezehome in Whiterun and can be acquired at any time.
Just put the file included in the .rar into your Data folder. An example path to the Data folder is:
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data
or for 32-bit OS: C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

This is also available at the Steam Workshop.

Changes:
1.0 - Initial Release
1.1 - Changed the Value so it doesn\'t sell for nearly as much.

Plans:
-Change the model to actually look like Zatoichi\'s Katana. Figured I\'d get it out there now, people can at least wield the power before they can see it!

*If anyone can help me get this working with the Nexus Mod Manager, plz send me a message! To be quite honest, I\'m not sure how to do this! It should be pretty easy with this mod :P
author: Inkubus

files.name: Zatoichis Katana
files.changelogHtml: Changed Value so it doesn\'t sell for nearly as much.
